text: The Aérospatiale SA-315 Lama is a French helicopter designed and built for operations in mountains. It is used by both civilians and the military. It is a fuselage of Alouette II which was assembled an Alouette III's turboshaft. Many were built in India as Cheetah. == References == Lama Category:Indian military aircraft Category:Helicopters
title: Aérospatiale SA-315 Lama
